about_desc: Aspiring web developer with the ability to communicate effectively in a team setting. Have done several projects involving frontend and backend development. Highly organized, multi-tasker with expertise in scheduling projects, enhancing designs, and verifying code. Have successfully developed elegant clones of websites. Seeking to further improve tech skills with a challenging role as a future software developer at a growth-oriented organization. I mainly develop MERN stack apps, i'm open to new opportunities.
experience_0_overview: A Global Non-profit emerging artist and youth development through art and education.
projects_1_overview: Leading travel suggestions website for all types of trips and travels around various cities worldwide.
projects_2_overview: Uboric offers you the chance to choose top branded products sitting in the comfort of your homes.
projects_1_extended_overview: Leading travel suggestions website for all types of trips and travels around various cities worldwide. Features : Login and Sign in authentication using regres and mock API Product slider for different categories using react carousel pixel perfect product pages. Responsibilities: Back-end part of the application Filter and sort functionality. Collaborative project of 5 members executed in 5 days
projects_2_extended_overview: Uboric offers you the chance to choose top branded products sitting in the comfort of your homes. Features: Login and Sign in authentication using Mongo DB and JSON server. Product slider for different categories using react slick. Authentication with Firewall and REST API. Responsibilities : Back-end part of the application. Signup and Sign in pages with higher-level react components. Contact Us page and About us page with Chakra UI. Collaborative project of 4 members executed in 5 days
projects_3_extended_overview: E-commerce website selling furniture. Features:- Login and registration page- Collection of products and their overview - Search and filter the products- Adding products to the cart section Responsibilities- Created a product overview model page- Responsive page with flexible UI- Designed a dynamic page of the products modelCollaborative project of 3 members executed in 4 days
